infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Monzi uses the camera to capture identity documents and selfies for account verification and KYC compliance. This ensures the security and authenticity of your financial account.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Monzi needs access to your photo library to allow you to select and upload identity documents for account verification.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Monzi uses Face ID to provide secure and convenient access to your financial account.
